name: Mapsters
description:
Mapsters is a single player campaign where the characters are primarily named from users on some random website (or variations thereof). It primarily follows the story of Wargirl, a broodmother, and her Lieutenant, Hockleberry. Wargirl is a middle management broodmother who intends on making her way up the ladder, perhaps even to head advisor to the Queen of Blades one day. Mission 1: Vespene Warlord
American Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/1/263246](<>)
European Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/2/184852](<>)
Jayborino Playthrough: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TT\_Kf\_orpIU]() ![https://media-elerium.cursecdn.com/attachments/160/400/BioDome.jpg]( =800x600) The zerg have received intel that there is a terran enemy conducting strange vespene experiments. Middle management broodmother, Wargirl, and her lieutenant, Hockleberry, have been sent to investigate. Mission 2: Snowball's Chance
American Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/1/264095](<>)
European Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/2/185394](<>)
Jayborino Playthrough: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BJxGweHH6ak]() ![]( =673x505) Wargirl's next conquest is on a terribly cold map with frequent flash freezes. In order to counter this, she has decided to strike hard and fast! She has ended up far from the primary hive, but it matters not as the enemy seems nearly defeated. Mission 3: The Omashu Performance Review
American Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/1/264733](<>)
European Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/2/185813](<>)
Jayborino Playthrough: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K5mGs7eAyOs]() ![]( =673x505) Because of Wargirl's recklessness in her last mission, she has been sentenced to cleaning up feral zerg on the planet Omashu as a performance review. Her nemesis, EvilDL, will be directly supervising her actions as well as rating her performance. Mission 4: Jayborino's Laboratory
American Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/1/265694](<>)
European Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/2/186549](<>)
Jayborino Playthrough: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P-7bRTGvv\_g]() ![]( =673x505) Wargirl commits to a daring rescue mission to save EvilDL despite her negative feelings towards him! Hockleberry is maintaing a force outside the lab to secure their escape. Special thanks to Narudek for contributing a custom model for this mission! Mission 4.5: The Cleanup Crew American Arcade Link: battlenet:://starcraft/map/1/292657
European Arcade Link: battlenet:://starcraft/map/2/204550
Jayborino Playthrough: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=htWg4y\_NFOA&t=]() ![]( =673x431) This is the first side mission of Mapsters and is also my submission for the mapcraft 2017 contest! Best played sometime after Mission 4! Brett, the Cleaner, and Kieth, the Foul Mouthed, are tasked with cleaning up one of Jayborino's failed experiments. Mission 5: The Cult of Sixen
American Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/1/266621](<>)
European Arcade Link: [battlenet://starcraft/map/2/187198](<>)
Jayborino Playthrough: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yli\_Uor-dg4]() ![]( =673x505) Jayborino has escaped! With no leads to his wherabouts and unable to contact TacoManDan, Wargirl decides to pay Narudek a visit. Mission 5.5: Uncle Danny American Arcade Link: battlenet:://starcraft/map/1/299997
European Arcade Link: battlenet:://starcraft/map/2/210193 Jayborino Playthrough: Pending ![]( =673x431) This is the second side mission of Mapsters! Best played after either mission 5 or 6. Brett and Kieth find themselves on another misadventure when they go to help out Brett's uncle! Mission 6: Saving Hockleberry American Arcade Link: battlenet:://starcraft/map/1/298736
European Arcade Link: Pending
Jayborino Playthrough: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DR2HZe-aKDk&t=]() ![]( =673x379) It is time to save Hockleberry and bring down Jayborino.
author: maskedimposter
